Nonbreeding.description: Nonbreeding Pigeon Guillemots look similar to nonbreeding Black Guillemots but they only overlap in the Bering Sea. Separated by dark underwing linings on Pigeon but not Black Guillemots.

Breeding adult.description: Pigeon Guillemots, which overlap in distribution only in the Bering Sea, are very similar, but has gray underwing linings and a broad black wedge across each white wing patch.
